name: Overstimulation Simulation
description:
Welcome to overstimulation simulation, a game that emulates my experience with a sensory processing disorder. Guide Emma through four everyday situations (and one not so common) and complete her To Do List while ensuring her stimulation meter does not overflow.

Navigate the menus with a click.

Use the A&D buttons to move, the space button to interact, and the alt button to engage in a conversation. I know this is all discussed in the tutorial level, but I want to put it here anyways.

Please note: this does not perfectly emulate life with a sensory processing disorder, nor does it emulate my situation. If it did, the game would take 30 times as long and not be fun for anyone. I made this to start a conversation in a (hopefully) fun way.

Also, while I have released this game, there are three more levels in the works. Not to mention more mechanics and features that hopefully don't get scrapped.
